title: 【Student Dormitory】Dormitory Application Information for Incoming Students, Winter Transfer Students, and Students on waiting list IV.
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 學務處生活輔導組 - 陳怡秀 - yishoue@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6212
對象： 全校學生_休學學生
標題： 【Student Dormitory】Dormitory Application Information for Incoming Students, Winter Transfer Students, and Students on waiting list IV.
日期： Wed, 8 Jan 2025 12:25:17 +0800

Dear students,
The following are the information regarding the dormitory application for incoming students, winter transfer students, and students on the waiting list IV.
1.Application Requirements
  1)New students: 113th Academic year incoming master, doctoral and winter transfer students
   2)Waiting list: Students who are currently enrolled and has paid all due payments.
2. Application Time
   1)Time:2025/01/21(Tue) 12:00, – 2025/02/06(Thu) 12:00
3. Application method
  1)Application will be all online (winter transfer students who received the registration notice on 2025/02/03, please contact us for registration)
   2)Login e-mail and password. https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/dorm/Login.aspx
4. Announcement of Accommodation Information
   1)Time: 2025/02/10(Mon) 12:00, room and bed numbers will be announced online
The 113-2 Semester dormitory will open on 2025/2/14(Fri) 12:00PM. 
※Dorm 5 (A, B) will open on 2025/2/14(Fri) 5pm.
   2)The Student Living Services Division reserves the right for final room assignments.
5.Dormitory Fee
For the related dormitory fees, please refer to the online dormitory fee standard, and the fees will be combined with the miscellaneous fees. https://school.bot.com.tw/newTwbank/StudentLogin.aspx
6. Application Procedure 
Apply Online –> Pay Fees –> Take receipt as proof of payment to the dormitory manager before moving in
7. Notes
Please read all rules and regulations concerning Dormitory Accommodation before submitting any accommodation application. 
    https://rb005.ndhu.edu.tw/p/403-1005-800.php
	※In case of amendments to the content of the regulations, please refer to the latest announcements 	by the Office of Student Affairs.
	1) National Dong Hwa University Dormitory Regulations
	2) NDHU Guidelines Governing Student Dorm Applications and Refunds
	3) NDHU Guidelines Governing Student Dorm Applications and Refunds
	4) NDHU Student Dorm Electrical Appliance Usage Regulations
	5) National Dong Hwa University Student Dormitory Penalty Standard
	6) National Dong Hwa University Dormitory Life Convention

For any questions or concerns, please contact: Ms. Chung at 03-8906217.
Student Living Services Division Office of Student Affairs
